content.text:
# Nigerien Rally for Democracy and Peace

The Nigerien Rally for Democracy and Peace (French: Rassemblement nigérien pour la démocratie et la paix) (abbreviated RNDP-Aneima Banizoumbou ) is a political party in Niger led by Mounkaila Issa.
History
The Nigerien Rally for Democracy and Peace is registered as a political party on April 16, 2019.
